recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Pour into a greased pan. Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.instructions: Chop lettuce. Add croutons and Parmesan cheese. Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss well.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. In a pan, sauté onion and garlic, add beef, cook until browned. Add tomato sauce and simmer for 15 minutes. Serve over spaghetti.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl. Add milk, egg, and butter. Cook on a greased skillet over medium heat until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.instructions: Heat sesame oil in a pan. Add garlic and vegetables, stir-fry for 5-7 minutes. Add soy sauce and toss to coat.

recipes.title: Pizza Margherita
ingredients: 1 tbsp of olive oil for drizzling
recipes.instructions: In a bowl, dissolve the yeast and sugar in warm water. Let it sit for 5-10 minutes until frothy. Add flour, salt, and olive oil. Knead until a smooth dough forms. Cover and let it rise for 1 hour. Roll out the dough into a circle. Spread tomato sauce evenly, sprinkle mozzarella cheese, and top with fresh basil leaves. Drizzle olive oil. Bake in a preheated oven at 220°C (425°F) for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly.
